page.title: 14Employment in Beckermet
page.content: The vast majority of the people of working age in the area are employed at the Sellafield Site. They work either in the Calder Hall Neuclear Power Station or in the chemical reprocessing plant of the Windscale Works. There are several farms in the area providing work and some private businesses such as garages and building fims. Most women are housewives. Some have their own private business such as the hairdresser. There is very little unemployment in the area except for the new school leavers for whom jobs are very scarce.
